name: Pyre
description: Deal the total amount of tinder buffs on target, consuming them.

immediateEffect.script: var tinderStatuses = GetStatuses(Opponent, "Tinder"); int tinderCount = tinderStatuses.Count; int damage = tinderCount * 10; foreach (var status in tinderStatuses) { RemoveStatus(status); } DealDamage(Opponent, damage);
